ygData.subject: Re: New bard quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Spent more than an hour running around Highpass and Highold looking for some Goldensong woman.  I finally growled that she could not possibly exist and burned
ygData.messageBody:
Spent more than an hour running around Highpass and Highold looking for some
Goldensong woman. I finally growled that she could not possibly exist and
burned the mail. Don't know why I spent so long on something that would
garner me nothing. I noticed there was a new Wood Elf in Rivervale wanting
mail delivered, and after about ten minutes saying different combinations of
"I will deliver the mail to Freeport," I finally hit on the right sentence!
Then I burned that too.

Roop


>From: grei@...
>
>> From: BrainBoss@...
>>
>> With today's patch, several new bard quests were implemented. Most (if
not
>> all) of them entail running packages from bard agents to other bard
agents,
>> though.
>>
>> Amhran Fasach
>> Fennin Ro
>
>Just don't stack the quests. I did that and by the time I made it from
>Kelethin to Freeport, all I got was a 'Thank you very much' instead of
>the adjustments, xp, and cash.
>
>Grei
>Bristlebane
>
>--
>
>Suddenly and embarrassingly, Grei's swash came unbuckled...
>
